title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin - Advent of the Red Comet
synopsis: What was the tragedy that decided the fates of Char Aznable, the man later nicknamed the "Red Comet" as an ace pilot of the Zeon forces, and his sister Sayla Mass?
